sentence: This witch plans to keep you spellbound with her magic.
sentence_tra: 这个女巫计划用魔法把你迷惑住。

sentence: We've chatted on the Internet, but this is the first time we've seen each other face to face.
sentence_tra: 我们在网上聊过，但这是我们第一次亲眼看见对方。

sentence: We always disagree about what to eat for dinner.
sentence_tra: 对于晚饭吃什么我们总是意见不合。

sentence: From the airplane I could see the entire city.
sentence_tra: 在飞机上我可以看到整个城市。

sentence: The German football team will be pretty hard to beat.
sentence_tra: 德国球队很难被打败。

sentence: The Bible is the holy book of the Christian religion.
sentence_tra: 《圣经》是基督教的圣书。

mean_cn: vi. 引述;  vt. 引用, 援引;
sentence: He always likes to quote the words of Chairman Mao.
sentence_tra: 这个男人很喜欢引用毛泽东语录。

sentence: Our business success is based on four fundamental principles.
sentence_tra: 我们生意的成功是基于四项基本的原则。

sentence: My parents wanted me to be well educated, so that's why I pursued my PhD.
sentence_tra: 我的父母希望我能受到很好的教育，这是我读博的原因。

mean_cn: n. 民族主义；国家主义；民族特性
sentence: Supporting your country's football team is a harmless type of nationalism.
sentence_tra: 支持祖国的足球队是种无害的民族主义行为。

sentence: I don't like the music the youth listen to these days.
sentence_tra: 我不喜欢现在这些青年人听的音乐。

mean_cn: adj. 利己的; 自私自利的;
sentence: Don't be selfish--you can't smoke around a pregnant woman!
sentence_tra: 不要太自私了―你不能在孕妇周围吸烟！

sentence: It's unfair for him to take the answers into the exam.
sentence_tra: 他把答案拿到考试中是不公平的。

mean_cn: v. 释放，解放，发行n. 解除，免除，发表
sentence: She releases the dove as a symbol of peace.
sentence_tra: 她放飞了白鸽，作为和平的象征。

sentence: Scientists believe that mankind evolved from monkeys.
sentence_tra: 科学家相信人类是从类人猿进化来的。

mean_cn: n.存折；南非有色人种身份证
sentence: My passbook contains a record of my bank transactions.
sentence_tra: 这是我存有银行记录的存折。

sentence: My lawyer thinks I should plead guilty, but I disagree.
sentence_tra: 我的律师认为我应该服罪，但是我不同意。

sentence: The man really lost heart when he lost all his money.
sentence_tra: 这人在失去了所有钱的时候，也丧失了信心。

mean_cn: vt. 献身于, 专心致力于;  奉献;
sentence: The woman devotes her entire life to her religion.
sentence_tra: 这个女人把一辈子都献身于她的宗教信仰。

sentence: The legal profession is very well-paid.
sentence_tra: 法律专业工作的工资很高的。

mean_cn: n. 毛毯; 毯子; 覆盖层;  adj. 总括的; 全面的; 不加区别的;  vt. 用毯子盖; 掩盖;
sentence: Is that your baby underneath this blanket?
sentence_tra: 在毛毯下面那个是你的小宝贝吗？

sentence: I told her I wanted to break up and she attacked me!
sentence_tra: 我告诉她我想分手，然后她就打了我！

sentence: I enjoy stories about how prisoners escape from prison.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢关于越狱的故事。

sentence: My trainer gave me some guidance about my exercise schedule.
sentence_tra: 我的教练给了我一些关于我训练课程的指导。

mean_cn: adj.情愿的，乐意的n.愿意，情愿
sentence: We're willing and able to help the earthquake victims.
sentence_tra: 我们有意愿并且有能力去帮助地震灾民。

mean_cn: n. 特性;  品性;  质量;  adj. 优质的;
sentence: I'm astonished by the quality of my pants!
sentence_tra: 我被我裤子的质量震惊了！

mean_cn: n. 亲戚；关系物， 同类事物adj.相对的，有关系的
sentence: They fight often even though they are relatives.
sentence_tra: 他们虽然是亲戚，但是也常常打架。

sentence: I sentence you to a year in prison!
sentence_tra: 我判你入狱一年！

sentence: Please don't blow up the world - it's my home!
sentence_tra: 请不要炸毁世界――它是我的家。

sentence: We are hopeful that the baby will be healthy.
sentence_tra: 我们希望婴儿出生健康。

mean_cn: adj. 宽厚的;  慷慨的;  充裕的;  肥沃的;
sentence: The generous man gives lucky money to us on November 11th.
sentence_tra: 这个慷慨的男人在11月11日给我们发红包。

sentence: I hate being out of work, especially because I loved my old job.
sentence_tra: 我讨厌失业，尤其因为我很喜欢以前那份工作。

sentence: The athlete leaps over the obstacles.
sentence_tra: 运动员跃过障碍。

mean_cn: 设立，创立；提议，提倡；预备；（军事）训练
sentence: We set up our tent by the shore of the lake.
sentence_tra: 我们在湖岸边扎起了帐篷。

sentence: As responsible citizens, it's our duty to vote.
sentence_tra: 作为有责任感的市民，投票是我们的责任。

sentence: An active lifestyle is important for staying healthy.
sentence_tra: 积极的生活方式对保持健康是重要的。

sentence: Thank you for your help - here's your fee.
sentence_tra: 谢谢你的帮助，这是给你的酬金。

sentence: My children were all educated in public schools.
sentence_tra: 我的孩子们都在公立学校接受教育。

mean_cn: 在危险、受罚、痛苦、忧虑等的处境中
sentence: I found out what you did, so now you're in trouble!
sentence_tra: 我发现了你干的事，你给我小心等着！

sentence: Hitler came to power in Germany in 1931.
sentence_tra: 希特勒在1931年执掌了德国政权。

sentence: He was sentenced to five years in prison for stealing.
sentence_tra: 他因为偷窃被判了五年监禁。

mean_cn: vt. 使…结盟, 与…联合;    vi. 结盟; 团结;  n. 联盟; 社团;
sentence: You are so good! You should join our soccer league!
sentence_tra: 你很厉害！你应该加入我们的足球社团！

sentence: This is such a peaceful spot.
sentence_tra: 这真是一个宁静的地方。

sentence: Should I care more about my own self, or about other people?
sentence_tra: 我应该更关心自己还是其他人？

sentence: Though young, he is a devoted follower of his religion.
sentence_tra: 尽管很年轻，他对自己的宗教很虔诚。

sentence: The United States is a republic, since its citizens elect people to represent it.
sentence_tra: 美国是共和制，因为每个公民都能选人去代表他们。

mean_cn: n. 平均值，方法 v.意味着 adj.下贱的，卑鄙的；平均的，吝啬的
sentence: The mean girls always made fun of her.
sentence_tra: 这些可恶的女孩儿总是取笑她。

sentence: My selfless boyfriend offered me the last food we had.
sentence_tra: 我无私的男朋友把最后的食物给了我。

sentence: I get on well with my father because we're both pretty easy-going.
sentence_tra: 我和我爸爸相处得很愉快,因为我们都很随和。

sentence: Please forgive me! I beg you!
sentence_tra: 对不起，求你原谅我。

sentence: We all have different ways of earning our livelihood.
sentence_tra: 我们每个人有不同的方法维持生计。

sentence: When I don't know a word, I turn to the dictionary.
sentence_tra: 当我遇到不认识的词时，我就求助于字典。

sentence: The alien invaders attacked earth in their flying saucers.
sentence_tra: 外星侵略者从飞碟中攻击了地球。

sentence: The businessmen founded their own company, so they cut the ribbon themselves.
sentence_tra: 商人们成立了自己的公司，所以他们自己来剪彩。

sentence: Can you recognize all of the presidents here?
sentence_tra: 你能认出这里所有的总统吗？

sentence: Violence doesn't solve any problems.
sentence_tra: 暴力解决不了任何问题。

mean_cn: n. 巨人;  伟人, 庞然大物;  adj. 巨大的;  卓越的;
sentence: This giant hamburger cannot fit in my mouth, but I'm so hungry I will eat it all!
sentence_tra: 我的嘴巴装不下这个巨大的汉堡包，但是我太饿了，一定要把它吃光！

mean_cn: n. 报答;  奖品;  补偿;  vt. 酬谢;  报答; 报应;
sentence: My reward for winning the race was a big trophy.
sentence_tra: 我赢得比赛的奖品是一个大奖杯。

sentence: The stage is decorated with a red curtain; it's perfect for putting on a play.
sentence_tra: 这个用红色幕布装饰起来的舞台很适合演戏剧。

mean_cn: v. 等于；比得上adj. 相等的；平等的n. 对手
sentence: Today, men and women are equal in the eyes of the law.
sentence_tra: 如今，男女在法律面前是平等的。

sentence: As a matter of fact, I know he's not a good policeman.
sentence_tra: 事实上，我知道他不是个好警察。

sentence: I feel a sense of terror when I see sharks.
sentence_tra: 当我看到鲨鱼时感到很惊恐。

sentence: Unfortunately, some modern farming methods involve a lot of cruelty.
sentence_tra: 不幸的是，一些现代农牧业生产方式还很残酷。

sentence: She was totally shocked by the big surprise.
sentence_tra: 她被这个巨大的惊喜给震惊了！

sentence: I didn't read the story; I only saw the headline.
sentence_tra: 我没看这个故事，我只看了眼标题。

sentence: He dressed up as if he was a warrior.
sentence_tra: 他盛装打扮就好像他是一名战士。

mean_cn: adj.健康的；恰当的n.井adv.顺利地int.嗯，啊，唔，好吧（表示惊讶、无奈或坚决主张等时的语气词，或用以引入话题）
sentence: I may be old, but I'm still alive and well.
sentence_tra: 也许我老了，但我依然健康有活力。

sentence: My computer was completely destroyed in the fire.
sentence_tra: 我的电脑被大火毁尽了。

sentence: These pipes are made of plastic, so they are very light.
sentence_tra: 这些管子是塑料做的，所以它们非常轻。

mean_cn: n.隐蔽住，躲避处(常用来指住处)；庇护v.遮蔽，掩护，庇护
sentence: They build shelters from ice to keep themselves warm.
sentence_tra: 他们用冰建造躲避处来抵御严寒。

sentence: Ronaldo was given first aid treatment after he injured his leg.
sentence_tra: 罗纳尔多在扭伤脚之后获得了第一时间的救助。

mean_cn: adj.无用的，无价值的，无效的
sentence: This computer is useless; I need to get a new one.
sentence_tra: 这台电脑不能用了，我需要换新的。

sentence: I run down the track as fast as I can.
sentence_tra: 我沿着跑道尽我最快速度跑。

sentence: Many graves were dug to bury the dead after a battle.
sentence_tra: 很多墓穴是挖来埋葬战后死者的。

mean_cn: v. 描绘，画出...的轮廓n. 外形，轮廓；大纲，概要
sentence: This outline of my invention should give you some idea of what I want.
sentence_tra: 这张关于我的发明的外形图应该会让你知道我想要什么。

sentence: I want to wash the dirt from my hands.
sentence_tra: 我想洗干净手上的泥。

sentence: I must deliver this message right away!
sentence_tra: 我必须马上去送信！

mean_cn: n. 极端；末端adj. 极端的；尽头的
sentence: The roller coaster has some pretty extreme turns; it might make you sick.
sentence_tra: 过山车有一些非常极端的转弯，这可能会让你觉得不舒服。

sentence: My patience with you is at an end!
sentence_tra: 我受够你了！

mean_cn: adv. 真诚地, 诚挚地;  忠实地;
sentence: He apologized sincerely to me, but I still didn't want to forgive him.
sentence_tra: 他很真诚地向我道歉，但我还是不想原谅他。

sentence: The dam keeps the river from flooding the town.
sentence_tra: 大坝让小镇免于河流泛滥的洪水。

mean_cn: v. 判断；审判；裁决 n. 法官；裁判
sentence: The judge decides if I will go to jail.
sentence_tra: 法官决定我是否会入狱。

sentence: My brother jumped out of the closet and frightened me.
sentence_tra: 我的弟弟从衣柜里跳出来，吓到我了。

mean_cn: n. 电力;  电流;  电学;
sentence: Pikachu has an ability to generate electricity.
sentence_tra: 皮卡丘会放电。

sentence: The entire city is destroyed. What a disaster!
sentence_tra: 整个城市都被毁了。真是场灾难！

sentence: The rescue team went to rescue the victims of the earthquake.
sentence_tra: 营救小组正在营救地震的受害者。

mean_cn: n. 标题;  头衔;  权利;  adj. 标题的, 题目的;  称呼的;  vt. 加标题于;  授予…称号;
sentence: I knew what the story was about by reading the title.
sentence_tra: 我看标题就知道这本书讲的是什么。

mean_cn: n. 百万;  许多;  adj. 百万;
sentence: I made a million dollars last year!
sentence_tra: 我去年赚了100万美元！

sentence: This dirty room is in ruins.
sentence_tra: 这个脏房间是一片废墟。

sentence: The construction vehicle is digging out a hole.
sentence_tra: 这个施工车辆正在挖洞。

sentence: A great number of people pass through the station every day.
sentence_tra: 每天都有大量的人路过这个车站。

sentence: You should build your house out of brick if you don't want it to burn down!
sentence_tra: 如果你不想你的房子被烧毁就应该用砖砌。

mean_cn: v. 开采, 采矿;n. 矿山; 地雷;pron. 我的(所有物）;
sentence: Will he find any gold in the mine?
sentence_tra: 他能在矿里找到金子么？

sentence: He's easily frightened by anything.
sentence_tra: 无论什么，都能轻易吓到他。

sentence: The first trains were powered by steam.
sentence_tra: 第一辆火车是蒸汽驱动的。

sentence: There were few survivors of the plane crash.
sentence_tra: 这场空难几乎没有生还者。

sentence: I can see the animals in my farmyard from  my farm's kitchen window.
sentence_tra: 透过农场厨房的窗户，我能看见我家庭院里的动物。

sentence: The miner found  lump of solid gold in the mine.
sentence_tra: 矿工在矿上发现一块纯金。

mean_cn: n. 运河;  水渠;  支流;
sentence: This city has many canals running through it.
sentence_tra: 这座城市有很多运河穿流其中。

mean_cn: v. 震动；颤抖n. 地震；颤抖
sentence: The lady quaked with fear when the police approached her.
sentence_tra: 当警察靠近她的时候，这位女士害怕得发抖。

sentence: The firemen rescue people from the burning building.
sentence_tra: 消防队员从失火的建筑中营救人。

mean_cn: n. 爆炸;  爆裂;  迸发;  vi. 爆炸;  迸发;  突然出现;  充满;  vt. 使爆炸;  使胀满;  使绽开;
sentence: The balloon got so big that it burst.
sentence_tra: 这个气球被撑得太大了，结果爆炸了！

sentence: I damaged my car when I drove off the road.
sentence_tra: 当我开下马路时撞毁了车。

mean_cn: adj. 有气味的, 有臭味, 散发臭味的;
sentence: Eww! My armpit is very smelly!
sentence_tra: 呃，我的胳肢窝真臭！

sentence: We live in a great nation!
sentence_tra: 我们住在一个伟大的国家！

mean_cn: n. 受难；苦楚adj. 受苦的，患病的
sentence: My mother's suffering is intense - her back really hurts.
sentence_tra: 我妈妈承受了很大的痛苦，她的背真的很痛。

mean_cn: n. 条;  闩;  障碍;  柜台; 酒吧 vt. 阻挡;  禁止;
sentence: There's no-one drinking in the bar - it's too early.
sentence_tra: 酒吧还没有人喝酒，太早了。

mean_cn: n. 快递，快车v. 表达，用快递邮出adj. 快速的，明确的
sentence: The express train travels at over 300 kilometers per hour.
sentence_tra: 这列特快列车时速超过300km。

mean_cn: adj. 骇人的; 令人惊恐的;  引起突然惊恐的;
sentence: OMG! Look at the frightening look of that wolf!
sentence_tra: 额的娘诶！快看那狼多骇人！

mean_cn: n.报告人，通讯员；记者，报导者
sentence: The reporters ask him questions.
sentence_tra: 记者们向他提出问题。

sentence: The fire will ruin everything in the house.
sentence_tra: 这火会毁坏房子里所有的东西。

sentence: Congratulations on your success!
sentence_tra: 祝贺你的成功！

sentence: Watch out for the traps--make sure not to step inside any of them.
sentence_tra: 小心陷阱，确保不要踩到任何一个。

mean_cn: n.裂缝；破裂声；挖苦话v.敲出裂痕，敲破；说(笑话)adj.最好的，一流的
sentence: The cliff has a big crack running across it.
sentence_tra: 悬崖上有一道大裂缝贯穿。

sentence: I have to attend an important fund-raising event this week.
sentence_tra: 这周我有一个很重要的筹款活动（事件）要参加。
